alert.note: Alert for Bayfield (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 17 at 2:58PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WITH LOW VISIBILITY MOVING IN... Snow showers were moving southwest toward Red Cliff, Bayfield, and Sand Bay this afternoon and will quickly reduce the visibility to a quarter to half mile. A quick half to one inch of snow is possible in these areas as these stronger snow showers move in between 320 and 350 PM. It`s possible a Snow Squall Warning may be needed for very low visibilities. Be prepared for low visibility. This could lead to temporary whiteout conditions and the potential for dangerous driving conditions. If you are traveling and encounter adverse winter driving conditions...reduce speed and make sure headlights are on.
